channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How AI is going to give your financial adviser new ways to manage your money
item.description: Trusted advisers will get a new life, not a pink slip.

item.title: Free trade is over in the U.S. — and Trump’s tariffs might even be working. Investors, take note.
item.description: Tariffs will become a vital source of revenue for a government that refuses to cut spending.

item.title: AMC’s stock soars, lifted by Wedbush’s upgrade amid an improving box office
item.description: Wedbush turned bullish on AMC’s stock, citing a more consistent movie-release slate over the next several quarters and prospects for market-share gain...

item.title: Stocks and U.S. government bonds sell off in tandem Friday as trade jitters cool rally
item.description: U.S. stocks and government bonds were swept up in a selloff on Friday, as President Trump’s threats of new tariffs against a host of U.S. trade partne...

item.title: How Trump’s big bill makes it easier for all Americans to get a tax break for charitable donations — not just rich people
item.description: An above-the-line deduction for charitable giving is expected to generate an estimated $74 billion for nonprofits over a decade.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.
